column2: Purple Dragon Knights

The Purple Dragons are the famous military of Cormyr, renowned for their discipline, skill, and loyalty. The Purple Dragons are considered to be one of the strongest armies in the Realms, and are well known for their heroism and acts of valor in the field of combat. They range from young nobles who joined as officers and Purple Dragon knights, to farmers who joined as Blades.
The position of Lord High Marshal is highly respected by cormyrians, nobles and peasants alike.

Knightly Honor

You will solemnly swear to serve Cormyr and her interests above all else. You'll vow to answer any call from the crown, the royal family, recognized nobles, and citizens in need, to the best of your ability. In time of war, you will return to your sworn position and bear arms in service to crown and country.
I swear.
I'm not sure yet.
Blades are armsmen, and the lowest rank in the order.
Swordcaptains are lieutenants of the Purple Dragons, overseeing the troops' training and discipline.
Constals are high-ranking officers.
Battlemasters are the highest generals of the Purple Dragon Knights.
Knightly Training
As you are a member of a knightly order, you can undergo rigorous training to achieve new abilities on the battlefield.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own character portrait, in order to give yourself a special Commander trait.
Summon Knight
As you are a member of a knightly order, you can request that a special Commander be summoned to your court.
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu, to summon a special Commander character to your court.
Inspire Soldiers
If a Holding does not have a full Garrison or Levy, you can choose to instantly refill it.
Enables you to §Gright-click§! on a holding, in order to instantly refill its Garrison.
Pick a Squire
Allows you to make a young courtier your squire.
Squire
A squire is typically a young boy, training to become a knight.
Hold a Jousting Tournament
As an important member of a knightly order, you can have your society hold a great tourney in your lands.
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu to hold a jousting tournament.
Establish Bloodline
As a leading member of a knightly order, you can expend large amounts of time and resources to immortalize yourself and your bloodline as paragons of chivalry.
Enables a decision in the §YIntrigue§! menu, that once used, may allow you to create a new bloodline.
